userreviews.userReview: OMG I absolutely loved this story. Rory is such a bad ass so full of life and laughter to find him in a coma waiting to die from hellhound poisoning was traumatizing. Claire the phoenix matriarch is his mate and on her way to heal him but as luck would have it she never arrives to the lair as planned because an evil griffin who plans to be her mate as well kidnaps her. And that my friends is all I will reveal of the story. Just know that there is plenty of emotional ups and downs as well as action to be found within, of course there is also romance in these pages.Do yourself a favor and grab a copy. Ms. Mills gets better with every story she writes and I am so glad that I was given an ARC for an honest review and hope to buy a copy as well.

This is one of my most favorite series of all time. I will drop everything to read a new release, as soon as it's out and you better not expect me to do anything while I'm reading it. Nothing gets done, except the book. This is the 13th book in the Dragon Guard Series. And this is Rory's story.Rory is the younger brother of Rian and Royce. He's always given his brethren crap and a hard time for being so gaga over their mates, well, now it's his turn. Only problem is, he was bit by a hell hound in the previous book and the poison is slowly killing him from the inside out, at the start of this book. He is basically in a coma, but can hear everything going on around him. The Elders, Kalysta, Siobhan, and Kyra are doing all they can do for him. There's only one person that can help him....Claire, the leader of the Clan of the Sun. She is on her way to him, but of course it can't be that easy. I absolutely love all of these characters. Claire is very interesting and I wasn't expecting her to be what she is. Yes, I'm being vague about her because I don't want to spoil it for you. But it's awesome. She is a badass, that's for sure. Claire will definitely give Rory a run for his money.Now with the ending. I'm hoping it's Kellan's story next. There were a lot of hints about what happened to him. Can't wait for the next one. I love this series

Book: Resurrecting Her Dragon (Dragon Guards #13)Author: Julia MillsPublication Date: 5/30/2016Reviewed by: Tammy Payne- Book Nook Nuts My Rating: 5 Stars REVIEW *May contain spoilers *The last book left us with Rory fighting for his life. He has tried and failed to wake his dragon. The healers finally figure out what they are doing wrong but will it be too late? Someone is on their way to help him and he has dreamed or saw visions but she is what he thought he never wanted. Well we get the good vs. evil and it is all hands on deck for the battle to save not only Rory but Claire also. We meet Claire' family and something is up between one of her cousins and one of the guardsmen but whom?This series continues to get better with each book. I thoroughly enjoyed this book.I was gifted this book for my honest review. Julia Mills

The Phoenix And The DragonThe youngest of the blue dragons ( the one who said mates are for saps) has fallen hard for his mate. Claire is the healer of her clan and feels the pull of her mates plight. Going to his aid she is kidnapped by dark forces. Rory must fight the poison in his body to help his mate. If a dragon looses his mate it is pure torture.This story has a little bit of everything. It has action, romance (very steamy romance) and humor. Claire is the perfect mate for Rory. She gives as good as she gets. Besides being a good at what he does, Rory is also the comic relief of the guardsmen. When he and Claire meet face to face for the first time Rory is knocked for a loop. He has found the woman the universe has made for him. Let the games begin.

Rory O'Reilly is the youngest of three brothers and the Guard commander for the Blue Thunder Clan, also a complete Joker and all around fun loving guy. Sadly he was bitten by a Hellhound in the rescue of this big brothers mate on their trip to Hell and is now on the brink of death. This prompts his mate to rush to his rescue she has known about him for a while even though he had no clue. Great story line love the twists and turns Lots of action and love. What better mate for Rory but a fiery Phonix.

This is book #13 in The Dragon Guard Series. These books continue to blow me away each and every time. Julia Mills knows how to grab your attention and keep it. Each book keeps you just as interested in the story as the first one did. This is a series I truly hope never ends. I will continue to read these books over and over. I can't wait to see what happens next. Thank you for such a truly wonderful series!

Rory lies in a coma after getting bitten by a hellhound. When he listens to the comments around him the name Claire Featherstone comes up and somehow he sees her riding to get to him to save him but dark clouds loom overhead of her. When she has an accident and is taken Rory's guardsman do everything in their power to get her back.I received an advanced copy of this book for an honest review. This is book 13 of the Dragon Guards by the author. I was so excited to get my hands on this book and I have to say out of all the book this is the #2 book of the series for me, IMHO. I have read every book in the series this has romance, action, epic drama, revenge all in 1 great book. what more could you ask for from the author.
Oooooo, continuing where it left off last book. It's nice to see Lugh's son in this more. Can't wait for the dove. #coyer

After swearing he would be an eternal bachelor, Rory learns that the only way to overcome the hell hound venom is by being rescued by his mate. Claire has always known that she would come to have a choice of picking a mate in the light or a mate in the dark. When Claire learns that Rory is incapacitated and dying she becomes determined to make it there in time before she can loose him. One problem becomes clear, the darkness isn't about to give her up. When the situation turns and Claire is depending on Rory to save her, will he over come his death bed and succeed? Will they be able to work together to do what needs to be done for safety?Another Julia Mills hit and I highly recommend this book to anyone whom loved paranormal romance. Rory was a favorite of mine when it comes to this series and I love his always joking attitude. Claire was the perfect fit for him and loved that the bird shifters were brought into the complete fold! Great book and cannot wait for more of this series!

Great continuation of the Dragon Guard series. Rory, the jokester of his clan, convinced he would never ever fall in love and be as embarrassing as his brethren, finally meets his match - the question though is, who rescues whom?Love this series, not least because each book can indeed be read as a standalone, as whatever happened before that a reader might miss, there is enough information to be caught up and enjoy the current storyline. And it is always lovely to meet characters from previous books.Great narration style, great characters and a good plot - you cannot wish for more (unless it were a better editor than the one(s) who looked for spelling and grammar errors in this series - missing things like "they're" instead of "there", for example, or other basic errors like this, really does hurt!)

INTERESTING SERIES, BUT BECAME REPETITIVE AFTER A FEW BOOKSAfter reading a few of these, I decided to write one review for all of them. I found these books to be pretty good, if somewhat formulaic. If a reader is looking for a good story with some drama & where the main characters go through some terrible things, but ultimately end up together, I think they will enjoy this series of books. It is sometimes nice to read a "happily ever after" story.

Must ReadThe more I read the more I want. Each book in this series seems to always be better than before. Love all the new shifters in this one. Was happy to see Rory find his mate Claire but poor Rory too many close calls. I loved the excitement and all consuming love as always.

Julia Mills Dragon's SoarThis is an amazing, thrilling, gripping story of deceit, rivalry, one of the most tender romantic love stories. Rory and Claire are amazing together. You have to read this book. Julia Mills is an author who will always rise to the occasion. All of her stories will entice and enthrall you.

Rescue missionRory was bit by a hellhound on the last mission and his body is shutting down. Claire has known of her mate for several years, she's checked in on him from time to time, now she's flying towards him her only thought to save him. Souls bound by fate, these two will fight to save one another more than once. You soar right along with them as the story flies by.

I love this series! I was quickly swept up in the story and couldn't put the book down. I love the characters and all their nuances. The author does a wonderful job of bringing them to life. Also, the descriptions the author paints had me feeling as though I was right there watching everything unfold. I can't wait to read what happens next.

Rory is a jokester, Claire is a Phoenix. As usual all hell breaks lose and the dragons have to save the day. Julia weaves a tale that holds you captive and threatens to never let you go....well until you finish. MUST READ!

Too good to put downJulia's books will pul you into her universe and will never let you go. Every story, every dragon , everyone of their mates will make you want to be there and finds very dragon of your own

Another fine dragonSo, I can’t seem to get these read in order, but that’s okay. This is Rory’s story, who was poisoned on a rescue mission. His mate is a really strong woman, she has to be to get through what she encounters on her way to save him.

Love itI can't seem to get enough of the Dragonguard. These books are amazing. Once I start reading, I can't put them down. On to the next one.
Awesome read!This is another awesome addition to the series. The storyline flows and keeps you wanting more. Can't wait to read more!
FantasticEvery installment of this series is fantastic. Can't wait for the next story. Julia Mills is a very skilled author with a wonderful imagination.

OMG I absolutely loved this story, there is so much happening and Rory really cops a lot of well-deserved hassle. Rory is the younger brother of Rian and Royce and has given them and his brethren so much loving hassle/crap about their sappiness over their mates, he is so full of life and laughter. He swears he is staying a confirmed bachelor.Then on their last mission into Hell to save his brothers mate Audrey, he is bitten by a HellHound and is slowly dying from the bites toxins.Nothing anyone can do is helping him, his dragon is comatose and Rory prepares himself to die, except there is one person who can save him. Rory is able to hear everything being said and realises the woman coming to save him could be his mate and after visions of her realises Claire is his mate and he gets frantic when he hears she has been taken. Luckily someone realises they have to reverse treat him and it works, saving his life. Read the story you will understand what I mean.Claire is the matriarchal leader of the Clan of the Sun and a very strong shifter in her own right. I am not telling you what she is but boy, big surprise. Along with Claire comes her family and oh my goodness, what wonderful new shifters have come into this series.A prophecy surrounds Claire, the choice between light and dark mates, Claire of course knows there is only one direction she is going to choose, especially after having visions of Rory and how good he is. Claire has known Rory is her mate for a while but believes in letting fate do her thing and in giving Rory time to choose to come find her, but when she knows Rory is in danger she gets on her motorbike and rides to save him.On her way to heal him she never makes it to the lair as planned because the dark griffin who plans to be her mate, kidnaps her. Boy, talk about Mommy issues.I absolutely love all of these characters. Claire is a very interesting character, nothing wallflower about her, she is a badass and another perfect woman to join this crazy group. I wasn't expecting her or her family to be the type of shifters they are and cannot wait to see more of all of them, hopefully as mates to some of the Dragon Guards still single.Claire and Rory are a perfect couple and once again fate has chosen well.

WOW! That is what I can say after reading Rory and Claire'ss story. I always knew Rory was an awesomely cool guy - but wow did he just change my mind. Amazingly cool, even staring dead in the eye - this man was still himself. He kept his humour and yet we see his strength as well. Yes, he is the joker and all that, but after going into hell and helping his big brother, Rian, save his mate and getting bitten by a hellhound (yep it will only happen to Rory). To crown it all, Kane, the son of the Celtic Sun God, Lugh, had to get his heart beating again and left his hand as a new tattoo on Rory's chest. And then he was in a coma, where he heard everything happening around him, but he was cut off from all those whom he loved. But all the mushy feelings he will keep as ammunition for the future - that's our Rory. (I loved the way he taunts his beast - but until he was healed our beast was not playing along - and it was funny to see Rory's frustrations.Claire, oh my word. She is awesome.you need to read her side of the story to get to know the baddies. Come on - you know with our Dragons there is never just an easy way. But Claire bought some challenges with her and Rory was not going to take it laying down - literally. Once Rory's beast woke up, it was not easy to keep the dude calm! That beastie wanted to rip the evil ones to pieces - I love Rory's beastie.Claire is strong in her own right, and suits Rory just fine. She shares his humor and his strength. But she as a matriarch of her own Clan she brings with her eons of wisdom and strategy. I adore her.Together they make a formidable team and I can not wait to hear more about them. Claire also bought some family to the story of the aviary shifter kind - and they are just as fun. We see Royce and Kyra as well - and I adore this pair! I can't wait for little Kyra's or Royce's - wait what about some little Rian's, Audrey's, Claire's and I definitely want to see some baby Rory's! PLEASE MISS JULIA!!!And there is Kellan - that male is making my heart bounce. I think I am falling for him because he is just one tough alpha male and I can't wait for his story - which if I am correct we see a bit happening there, Miss Julia? If you want to know all the details, you going to want to read this book!

Another 5-star book from the extremely talented Julia Mills.A woman rushing to save her mate from the toxins of a hellbound bite, only to be delayed by the annoying griffen shifters. She is the destiny of two different males, one who will keep her in the light, where she wants to be, the other to lead her into the dark. The griffins seek to mate her to their leader, Malik Slade, without her permission, but she has chosen her mate, and he's a dragon.A man stuck in his own mind, only able to hear what is going on around him. He knows his time is running out, the toxins from the bite of the hellhound are taking their toll on him. He hears his family and friends talk of a woman, possibly another healer, who they are looking for, only to find she has left to go to him, and he also learns that she could be his mate?? Him, the one who always said he would never be mated, might have a mate?? Then as he slumbers his dreams answer all of his questions, he starts hounding his alter ego, his dragon, to wake up and find their mate.Will these two find each other and their happily ever after? You will have to click on the bright yellow BUY NOW, to get your nose into this book!!! You will not regret it! I have read every single one of Julia's books and have never been let down by her writing. All of her books have a way of sucking you in from the get go and not letting you do anything but read until the end. It's almost like big hands come out of the book to grab you and hold you in place until you have read every last page. I cannot wait to see what the future brings for Julia and the dragons!!

Dragon and Phoenix shifters are true mates.While the Dragon brothers work hard to keep their youngest brother alive after he was bitten by a hell hound, his Phoenix mate who he has never met is racing to him being chased by a few evil creatures bent on force mating her to their king. How they get together is unsure. Good plot twists.

Rory is the youngest dragon brother and something of a jokester . While he is an excellent fighter and Dragon Guard, he still tends not to take things to seriously, until he is bitten by a hellhound on his last mission, and unless some kind of miracle happens, he's going to be a dead dragon. Enter his miracle in the form of Claire a Phoenix (Sun Bird, Thunderbird) whose tears can heal anything including hellhound bites. Just one problem, a Griffin has decided Claire is his mate and he intervenes by sending his brother and a bunch of other griffins to bring her "home" , just as she's riding to heal Rory. Of course with Rory in a coma, the other Dragons set up a rescue plan to go and get Claire back, but Rory takes a turn for the worse, and a close family friend lends him some strength and we'll, your going to need to read the book to learn the rest !! I don't do spoilers !! Just know that this is one of the best of the 13 books in the series. There is action, angst, love, fear, and several new key characters are introduced. All while keeping beloved characters from the previous books front and center. While this is a stand alone book and you could read it without knowing anything from the previous books, you will enjoy it to its fullest by reading the other books in the series. Kudos Julia Mills 5 ☆'s . Can't wait for book 14, and anyone who says 13 is an unlucky number, should read this 13th book of this series !!

Bk #13 continues from Bk #12 with Rory O'Reilly being bitten by a hellhound and it's poison is going through his system and he's paralyzed. There is only one person who can save him and that's Clair Featherstone, the Matriarch of the Clan of the Sun. This is the year that she will have to choose a mate-between good and evil. She has seen the evil Malik and will not be choosing him. She also has seen Rory and knows he is her mate, is a dragon and has chosen him. Rory also has had dreams of this gorgeous woman and knows she is his mate - if he lives to see her. Claire is on her way to save Rory and claim him has her mate. If it only was as simple as it sounds, but then it never is.I just loved this story about Rory & Claire-the story pulls you in from the start until the finish! It has sexy romance, plenty of action and suspense. Besides who doesn't love Dragons and there are plenty of them!! Also enjoyed meeting some new friends. I so highly recommend this book and the whole series.

Received ARC in exchange for honest review. Normally, I pre-order her books and devour them when they are released. This time I was given the opportunity to do an ARC and I jumped at the chance!This is Rory's story and as you remember he got poisoned by a Hellhouse in book 12 and is near death. Only she can save him, by her I mean Claire who happens to be his mate too! She's a different species and I dont wanna give everything away. She's on her way to him to save his life. However, she has a pain in the butt "suitor" who wont take no for an answer. Him and his whole family is cray cray! Talk about mommy issues! I loved Claire. She was wonderful and easy to love her character. I've loved Rory's character from when we first meet him...books ago. The question is will Claire get to him in time? Will she escape her "suitor's" evil clutches? Guess you gotta read it! Loved it Julia! XO

description: Book 13 in the Dragon Guard series. The books can be read as stand-alone stories, but it is advisable to read them in order to get the most enjoyment from the series. One dragon on the brink of death… One extraordinary woman who is so much more than she seems… One prophecy that could ruin them all… This one’s for all the marbles. Fate Will Not Be Denied but that was before the Sun got involved… This book contains explicit sexual material and violence. It is only suited for mature readers 18 years of age and older.
